card1.title: Loans get rejected because your records aren't organized
card1.description: Whether it's a Business Loan, Personal Loan, or SACCO Loan – they all need proof of income. Handwritten notes don't cut it.

card2.title: Every lender demands a clean statement they can trust
card2.description: Banks, SACCOs, Chamas, Women's Fund, WEF – all ask for organized M-Pesa statements showing steady income.

card3.title: Manual bookkeeping steals 20+ hours every month
card3.description: Copying 200+ M-Pesa transactions into Excel, fighting with PDF passwords, and reconciling totals is exhausting.

step1.title: Upload your Safaricom M-Pesa statement
step1.description: PDF, CSV, or even a screenshot – 60 seconds to get started, passwords handled automatically.

step2.title: We auto-organize everything in under 2 minutes
step2.description: Income, expenses, cash flow, and trends categorized for you. No Excel, no manual editing.

step3.title: Apply to ANY lender with confidence
step3.description: Download loan-ready reports or share directly with Banks, SACCOs, Chamas, WEF, Women's Fund – any lender that needs proof of income.

q1.question: Does this work for Personal Loans too? Or just Business Loans?
q1.answer: YES! M-Recon works for ANY loan type: Business Loans, Personal Loans, SACCO Loans, Chama Loans, Women's Fund, WEF. We organize your M-Pesa income – lenders don't care what you call it.

q2.question: How much will M-Recon cost?
q2.answer: KES 500/month. First 100 waitlist members stay on the beta plan (KES 0) for up to 30 transactions/month until we launch publicly.

q3.question: Which banks/institutions accept M-Recon records?
q3.answer: Our records format meets standard requirements for Banks, SACCOs, Chamas, WEF, and Women's Fund. Your organized M-Pesa statement works for ALL of them.

q4.question: Are you partnering with any SACCOs or lenders?
q4.answer: We are preparing pilots with Nairobi-based SACCOs (starting with Kimisitu SACCO) and community lenders. Once the first partnership is live, waitlist members get early invites and preferential onboarding.

q5.question: What about my data privacy?
q5.answer: Your financial data is encrypted and stored securely on Kenyan servers. We never share it with third parties.

q6.question: When will M-Recon launch?
q6.answer: We are targeting Q1 2026. Join the waitlist to be the first to know and test the beta!

q7.question: Do I need internet all the time?
q7.answer: No. Upload your PDF with internet, then access your records offline anytime.
